entries: While you have the Blinded condition, you experience the following effects.
You can't see and automatically fail any ability check that requires sight.
entries.name: Can't See

entries: {@action Attack|XPHB} rolls against you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB}, and your attack rolls have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}.
entries.name: Attacks Affected

condition.name: Blinded

entries: While you have the Charmed condition, you experience the following effects.
You can't attack the charmer or target the charmer with damaging abilities or {@variantrule Magical Effect|XPHB|magical effects}.
entries.name: Can't Harm the Charmer

entries: The charmer has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on any ability check to interact with you socially.
entries.name: Social Advantage

condition.name: Charmed

entries: While you have the Deafened condition, you experience the following effect.
You can't hear and automatically fail any ability check that requires hearing.
entries.name: Can't Hear

condition.name: Deafened

entries: While you have the Exhaustion condition, you experience the following effects.
This condition is cumulative. Each time you receive it, you gain 1 Exhaustion level. You die if your Exhaustion level is 6.
entries.name: Exhaustion Levels

entries: When you make a D20 Test the roll is reduced by 2 times your Exhaustion level.
entries.name: D20 Tests Affected

entries: Your {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is reduced by a number of feet equal to 5 times your Exhaustion level.
entries.name: Speed Reduced

entries: Finishing a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB} removes 1 of your Exhaustion levels. When your Exhaustion level reaches 0, the condition ends.
entries.name: Removing Exhaustion Levels

condition.name: Exhaustion

entries: While you have the Frightened condition, you experience the following effects.
You have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on ability checks and attack rolls while the source of fear is within line of sight.
entries.name: Ability Checks and Attacks Affected

entries: You can't willingly move closer to the source of fear.
entries.name: Can't Approach

condition.name: Frightened

entries: While you have the Grappled condition, you experience the following effects.
Your {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is 0 and can't increase.
entries.name: Speed 0

entries: You have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against any target other than the grappler.
entries.name: Attacks Affected

entries: The grappler can drag or carry you when it moves, but every foot of movement costs it 1 extra foot unless you are Tiny or two or more sizes smaller than it.
entries.name: Movable

condition.name: Grappled

entries: While you have the Incapacitated condition, you experience the following effects.
You can't take any {@variantrule Action|XPHB|action}, {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, or {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB}.
entries.name: Inactive

entries: Your {@status Concentration|XPHB} is broken.
entries.name: No Concentration

entries: You can't speak.
entries.name: Speechless

entries: If you're Incapacitated when you roll {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB}, you have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on the roll.
entries.name: Surprised

condition.name: Incapacitated

entries: While you have the Invisible condition, you experience the following effects.
If you're Invisible when you roll {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB}, you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on the roll.
entries.name: Surprise

entries: You aren't affected by any effect that requires its target to be seen unless the effect's creator can somehow see you. Any equipment you are wearing or carrying is also concealed.
entries.name: Concealed

entries: {@action Attack|XPHB} rolls against you have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}, and your attack rolls have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB}. If a creature can somehow see you, you don't gain this benefit against that creature.
entries.name: Attacks Affected

condition.name: Invisible

entries: While you have the Paralyzed condition, you experience the following effects.
You have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.
entries.name: Incapacitated

entries: Your {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is 0 and can't increase.
entries.name: Speed 0

entries: You automatically fail Strength and Dexterity {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB|saving throws}.
entries.name: Saving Throws Affected

entries: {@action Attack|XPHB} rolls against you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB}.
entries.name: Attacks Affected

entries: Any attack roll that hits you is a {@variantrule Critical Hit|XPHB} if the attacker is within 5 feet of you.
entries.name: Automatic Critical Hits

condition.name: Paralyzed

entries: While you have the Petrified condition, you experience the following effects.
You are transformed, along with any nonmagical objects you are wearing and carrying, into a solid inanimate substance (usually stone). Your weight increases by a factor of ten, and you cease aging.
entries.name: Turned to Inanimate Substance

entries: You have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.
entries.name: Incapacitated

entries: Your {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is 0 and can't increase.
entries.name: Speed 0

entries: {@action Attack|XPHB} rolls against you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB}.
entries.name: Attacks Affected

entries: You automatically fail Strength and Dexterity {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB|saving throws}.
entries.name: Saving Throws Affected

entries: You have {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to all damage.
entries.name: Resist Damage

entries: You have {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition.
entries.name: Poison Immunity

condition.name: Petrified

entries: While you have the Poisoned condition, you experience the following effect.
You have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attack rolls and ability checks.
entries.name: Ability Checks and Attacks Affected

condition.name: Poisoned

entries: While you have the Prone condition, you experience the following effects.

Your only movement options are to {@variantrule Crawling|XPHB|crawl} or to spend an amount of movement equal to half your {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} (round down) to right yourself and thereby end the condition. If your {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is 0, you can't right yourself.
entries.name: Restricted Movement

entries: You have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attack rolls. An attack roll against you has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} if the attacker is within 5 feet of you. Otherwise, that attack roll has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}.
entries.name: Attacks Affected

condition.name: Prone

entries: While you have the Restrained condition, you experience the following effects.
Your {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is 0 and can't increase.
entries.name: Speed 0

entries: {@action Attack|XPHB} rolls against you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB}, and your attack rolls have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}.
entries.name: Attacks Affected

entries: You have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on Dexterity {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB|saving throws}.
entries.name: Saving Throws Affected

condition.name: Restrained

entries: While you have the Stunned condition, you experience the following effects.
You have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.
entries.name: Incapacitated

entries: You automatically fail Strength and Dexterity {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB|saving throws}.
entries.name: Saving Throws Affected

entries: {@action Attack|XPHB} rolls against you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB}.
entries.name: Attacks Affected

condition.name: Stunned

entries: While you have the Unconscious condition, you experience the following effects.
You have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} and {@condition Prone|XPHB} conditions, and you drop whatever you're holding. When this condition ends, you remain {@condition Prone|XPHB}.
entries.name: Inert

entries: Your {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is 0 and can't increase.
entries.name: Speed 0

entries: {@action Attack|XPHB} rolls against you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB}.
entries.name: Attacks Affected

entries: You automatically fail Strength and Dexterity {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB|saving throws}.
entries.name: Saving Throws Affected

entries: Any attack roll that hits you is a {@variantrule Critical Hit|XPHB} if the attacker is within 5 feet of you.
entries.name: Automatic Critical Hits

entries: You're unaware of your surroundings.
entries.name: Unaware
